1: Water is essential to the semiconductor manufacturing process. We use ultrapure water to remove impurities from our silicon wafers, and we use fresh and
reclaimed water to run our manufacturing facility systems. Through our RISE goals, we have committed to achieve net positive water globally, and as part
of that effort, conserve 60 billion gallons of water in this decade. Water conservation reduces the amount of water needed from fresh water sources; we
have conserved 35.9 billion gallons  of water and enabled restoration of 9.6 billion gallons  of water to local watersheds since 2020. In 2023, we linked a
portion of our executive and employee performance bonus to our target to conserve and restore 12.0 billion gallons of water during the year.
